original_text: He burnt his own son with fire as a sacrifice. He used magic and false gods to find out what would happen in the future. He took advice from magicians and people who talked to the spirits of dead people. He did many things that the Lord said were very evil. This made the Lord very angry.
korean_text: 또 자기의 아들을 불 가운데로 지나게 하며 점치며 사술을 행하며 신접한 자와 박수를 신임하여 여호와께서 보시기에 악을 많이 행하여 그 진노를 일으켰으며

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 죽은 사람들의 영과 대화하는 사람들에게서
